title: Lyon Jazz Festival
content: Enjoy world-class jazz performances from renowned artists.

title: Art & Sculpture Exhibition
content: Experience breathtaking sculptures and paintings by local artists.

title: Gastronomy and Wine Fair
content: Explore the best of Lyon's food and wine in this annual fair.

title: Historical Walk Through Old Lyon
content: Take a guided walk through Lyon's historic district.

title: Tech Innovators Meetup
content: Meet tech enthusiasts and discuss groundbreaking innovations.

title: Lyon Symphony Orchestra Night
content: An evening filled with mesmerizing symphony performances.

title: Modern Art Gallery Tour
content: Discover modern art pieces from upcoming and established artists.
place: MAC Lyon - Museum of Contemporary Art

title: Medieval Architecture Tour
content: Step back in time with this guided tour of medieval landmarks.

title: Classic Film Screening: French Cinema
content: Relive the golden era of French cinema with classic film screenings.

title: Street Food Festival
content: Taste a variety of international and local cuisines at this festival.
